entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 31.
